definition: Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat

sentences.english: Attracts and captures mosquitoes and other biting insects like midges, black flies and no-see-ums.
sentences.chinese: 能有效捕捉蚊子及其他咬蟲，如蠓，黑蠅等。

sentences.english: The result provides bases for the further study on sucking-blood midges .
sentences.chinese: 爲深入開展遼寧省吸血蠓的研究提供了初步依據。

sentences.english: Conclusion Basis is given for faunal distriction on bloodsucking midges in 3 provinces of Northeast China.
sentences.chinese: 結論爲東北3省吸血蠓的區系分佈研究提供了依據。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate species distribution of blood-sucking midges from Changbaishan of China.
sentences.chinese: 目的調查長白山吸血蠓的種類分佈。

sentences.english: Objective To study on species distribution and classification of Culicoides vexans section.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究中國騷擾庫蠓組的分佈和分類。

sentences.english: Conclusion Base is given for faunal distribution of blood-sucking midges from Changbaishan of China.
sentences.chinese: 結論爲長白山吸血蠓的區系分佈研究提供了依據。

definition: a weevil found in rice etc
